Colorado_Springs.University of the Rockies: University of the Rockies (UoR) is an accredited for-profit university located in Denver, Colorado. It offers graduate and postgraduate instruction in the social and behavioral sciences both online and at its Denver Instructional Site. The university's programs are organized into two schools: The School of Professional Psychology (SOPP) and the School of Organizational Leadership (SOL), offering masters and doctorate degrees as well as graduate level certificate programs.
